statgraphics
Class GraphicalAnalysis

java.lang.Object
  statgraphics.GraphicalAnalysis
Direct Known Subclasses:
BarPlot, BoxPlot, CombinedLineBarPlot, Histogram, LinearRegressionPlot, LinePlot, PiePlot, PlotFactory, ScatterPlot, StatisticalPlots, SurvivalEstimatePlot, TimeSeriesPlot
public abstract class GraphicalAnalysis
extends java.lang.Object

The base class for graphical analysis. A number of classes for generating a variety of plots can inherit from this class.
